TestCase.name: testSingleRowCrossJoin
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a1, asum FROM A, (SELECT sum(a1) + sum(a2) AS asum FROM A)

LogicalProject(a1=[$0], asum=[$2]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, A]]) +- LogicalProject(asum=[+($0, $1)]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], agg#0=[SUM($0)], agg#1=[SUM($1)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, A]])

NestedLoopJoin(where=[true], join=[a1, asum], joinType=[InnerJoin], build=[right], singleRowJoin=[true]) :- Exchange(distribution=[any], exchange_mode=[BATCH]) : +- Calc(select=[a1]) : +- BoundedStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[a1, a2]) +- Exchange(distribution=[broadcast]) +- Calc(select=[+($f0, $f1) AS asum]) +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], select=[Final_SUM(sum$0) AS $f0, Final_SUM(sum$1) AS $f1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- LocalHashAggregate(select=[Partial_SUM(a1) AS sum$0, Partial_SUM(a2) AS sum$1]) +- BoundedStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[a1, a2])

TestCase.name: testSingleRowJoinInnerJoin
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a2, sum(a1) FROM A GROUP BY a2 HAVING sum(a1) > (SELECT sum(a1) * 0.1 FROM A)

LogicalFilter(condition=[>($1, $SCALAR_QUERY({ LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[*($0, 0.1)]) LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], agg#0=[SUM($0)]) LogicalProject(a1=[$0]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, A]]) }))]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[SUM($1)]) +- LogicalProject(a2=[$1], a1=[$0]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, A]])

Calc(select=[a2, EXPR$1]) +- NestedLoopJoin(where=[>(EXPR$1, $f0)], join=[a2, EXPR$1, $f0], joinType=[InnerJoin], build=[right], singleRowJoin=[true]) :- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[a2], select=[a2, Final_SUM(sum$0) AS EXPR$1]) : +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a2]]) : +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[a2], select=[a2, Partial_SUM(a1) AS sum$0]) : +- BoundedStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[a1, a2]) +- Exchange(distribution=[broadcast]) +- SortAggregate(isMerge=[false], select=[SINGLE_VALUE(EXPR$0) AS $f0]) +- Calc(select=[*($f0, 0.1) AS EXPR$0]) +- SortAggregate(isMerge=[true], select=[Final_SUM(sum$0) AS $f0]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- LocalSortAggregate(select=[Partial_SUM(a1) AS sum$0]) +- Calc(select=[a1]) +- BoundedStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[a1, a2])
